transcript:
Executive: Hello, good morning, IndiaMART se ${Exec_Name} bol rahi hu.
Customer: Ha good morning madam.
Executive: Sir, aapka IndiaMART pe listing hai?
Customer: Ha hai.
Executive: Sir, aapka company name confirm karenge?
Customer: [Inaudible]
Executive: Okay sir, aapko IndiaMART se kya help chahiye?
Customer: Madam, maine jo payment kiya tha uska refund kab tak aayega?
Executive: Okay sir, aapne refund ke liye request kab raise kiya tha?
Customer: Request maine kiya tha lagbhag 15 din ho gaya.
Executive: 15 din ho gaya, theek hai sir, main aapka check kar leti hu, ek minute hold pe rahiye.
Customer: Ha theek hai.
(silence)
Executive: Sir, aapne 15 din pehle kiya tha, aapka jo refund hai woh process ho gaya hai, aapko within two to three working days mein aapke account mein aa jayega.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Aur koi help chahiye sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi madam, thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir, have a nice day.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know refund status.



Resolution:

- Executive checked and confirmed refund is processed.

- Refund will be credited in 2-3 working days.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, account
